name: Maddog Motorcycle Stunts
description: Awesome 3D motorcycle stunt game will challenge and inspire you.  9 levels in this fun game. Collect coins as you go.  Mobile controls:  Touch screen in front of rider to move forward.  Touch screen behind rider to roll backward.  Add downward force on the back wheel by tipping device to the left; tip it right to control front wheel.  Please feel free to leave feedback for desired future improvements and standby for Version 2.  Thank you for playing Maddog Motorcycle Stunts.
